Name: Pinball Groupies
About the game: Pinball Groupies is a solo sexually charged pinball simulation indie game for Windows PC! Conquer and unlock each level for memorable access to galleries containing photos of all of your fans. You fill the shoes of a world champion Pinball Wizard, at the top of your game, and the fans love a winner... in this case I mean they really LOVE a winner! Play through 8+ different challenging levels of hot pinball action and excitement! The higher you score, the friendlier the fans get! It's time to score! • 8 Levels of addictive pinball action featuring 8 gorgeous girls of varying personality and style. • An unlockable level select and gallery of photos. • Simplified controls
